content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
I LOVE THIS PLACE!The servers are very friendly and attentive, the food is flavorful, and there is easy and affordable valet parking.I've been here a couple of times on a Friday night around 8ish pm and never have to wait although it seems like it picks up around 10ish pm. Food came out quickly which is a plus! SO pleased with this spot! Great place to share a variety of dishes and drink with some friends. Will keep bringing more pals to this spot.HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! NEEDS MORE HYPE (or do we gatekeep this lol)
